PageTitle: peer description(BGP multi-instance VPN instance IPv4 address family view)(group)
FuncDef:
The peer description command configures a description for a peer group.
The undo peer description command deletes the description of a peer group. The peer description command configures a description for a peer group. The undo peer description command deletes the description of a peer group. By default, no description is configured for a peer group.
ParentView: BGP multi-instance VPN instance IPv4 address family view

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the name of a BGP peer group.
The value is a string of 1 to 47 case-sensitive characters and cannot contain spaces. If the character string is quoted by double quotation marks, the character string can contain spaces.

Specifies a description.
The value is a string of 1 to 255 characters. Letters, digits, and spaces are supported.

ExtraInfo: The peer description can be used to configure a description for a peer group, which facilitates management of peers or peer groups. The description records information about the peer group, such as the VPN instance to which the peer group belongs, and devices that establish peer relationships with the peer group.
